Governor Hochul is Delivering Results for New Yorkers

From the day Governor Hochul took office, her commitment to every New Yorker has been simple: “your family is my fight." In her inaugural address, she laid out a clear vision: make New York more affordable, safer, and fairer for every family. She pledged to take on the state’s toughest challenges head-on and invest in what makes New York, New York. Over four years later, Governor Hochul has delivered on that promise, putting money back in New Yorkers' pockets, keeping communities safe, defending fundamental rights from Washington's attacks, and fighting for hardworking families. And she’s just getting started.

  • Shootings down 60% across New York

  • Created more than 814,000 private sector jobs

  • Tripled the child tax credit

  • More than 10,000 illegal guns off the street

  • Retail theft down 14% statewide

  • Helped over 1,000 homeless New Yorkers living in the subway system get the mental health care they need

  • Record low crime on the New York City subway

  • $3 billion+ for public safety and law enforcement

  • Advanced Second Avenue Subway and Interborough Express

  • Opened the first utility-scale wind farm

  • Secured Micron's $100 billion investment

  • Bell-to-bell phone ban in K-12 schools

  • Increased the minimum wage and tied it to inflation

  • Built or preserved over 70,000 units of housing

  • Free school meals for every kid in New York

  • $7.6 billion investment in childcare over four years

  • Put 170,000 kids in child care seats that are capped at $15 per week

  • Opened Grand Central Madison

  • Delivered $1.4 billion in energy savings

  • Banned insulin copays

  • Cut middle class tax rates to their lowest level in 70 years 

  • Sent inflation refund checks to 8 Million New Yorkers

  • Launched Empire AI

  • Protected and expanded reproductive rights
